Params: {3: 'The team walks over the empty streets. Shop banners sway in the wind, shaking some dust off. They seem to have been left unattended for a long time.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Why do I have a strange feeling about this place...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "These lamps are all filled with lamp oil. I don't think they can last so long without maintenance.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Someone seems to be still around. Can we find them?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Whoever they are, I think they will stay at a place that can overlook the entire city.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Taking the high ground is often the best strategy for defense, especially when there is a shortage of manpower.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Put down everything you plan to take from here immediately and leave.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Sorry, there must be a misunderstanding. We aren't taking anything away, except...!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The clash of blades interrupts all conversations, sending a powerful shockwave across everyone who shakes the wooden shed in disrepair.'}
{3: 'His gigantic body pushes the blade forward, forcing Lucia to fall back to an empty ground...'}
